comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Same man is pictured at www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/ggbain.25975/ a Bain picture not yet at Flickr. There he is identified as Major Jas. (i.e., James) A.Blair, Jr. James A. Blair, Jr (of New York) appears in the social columns of New York papers quite frequently.

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content:
swanq:

Thanks for both offering up more information on Mr. Blair, and connecting him to another of our Bain photographs. We will update both records with more detail.

comment.author: 38393197@N08
comment._content: In 1920, James A. Blair, Jr was one of the Governor's of the Aero Club of America (later called the National Aeronautic Association)

comment.author: 38393197@N08
comment._content: He was a Colonel in rank in 1920 too.
